Welcome to pytraj’s documentation - nothing to see yet!¶

Overview

pytraj is a Python front-end of the popular cpptraj package. Its aim is to expose cpptraj‘s funtions to Python’s ecosystem. Enjoy.

Simple code

In [1]: import pytraj as pt

In [2]: traj = pt.iterload('data/tz2.ortho.nc', 'data/tz2.ortho.parm7')

In [3]: print(traj)
<pytraj.TrajectoryIterator, 10 frames, include:
<Topology: 5293 atoms, 1704 residues, 1692 mols, PBC with box type = ortho>>
           

In [4]: data = pt.rmsd(traj, ref=0, mask='@CA')

In [5]: print(data)
[ 0.      0.2641  0.386   0.2688  0.2619  0.4576  0.4565  0.4443  0.4363
  0.4475]
